title: How to Make Chewy Chocolate Cherry Cookies

steps.headline: Spoon flour lightly into dry measuring cup; level with a knife.
Combine flour, cocoa, baking powder, baking soda, and salt, stirring with a whisk.
Place sugar and butter in a large bowl; beat with a mixer at high speed until well blended.
Add vanilla and eggs; beat well.
With mixer on low speed, gradually add flour mixture.
Fold in cherries and chocolate chips.
Drop by tablespoonfuls 2 inches (5.1 cm) apart onto baking sheets coated with cooking spray.
Bake at 350°F for 12 minutes or just until set.
Remove from oven; cool on pans for 5 minutes,
Cool completely on wire racks and enjoy!

text: Preheat oven to 350°F.  Spoon flour lightly into dry measuring cup; level with a knife.  Combine flour, cocoa, baking powder, baking soda, and salt, stirring with a whisk.  Place sugar and butter in a large bowl; beat with a mixer at high speed until well blended.  Add vanilla and eggs; beat well.  With mixer on low speed, gradually add flour mixture.  Beat just until combined.  Fold in cherries and chocolate chips.  Drop by tablespoonfuls 2 inches (5.1 cm) apart onto baking sheets coated with cooking spray.  Bake at 350°F for 12 minutes or just until set.  Remove from oven; cool on pans for 5 minutes,  Cool completely on wire racks and enjoy!
